docs.summary: List or send messages between the site and visitors, contacts, or members.

permissions.name: Manage Inbox Messages
permissions.description: Request permissions to read and send chat messages on behalf of the site and visitors.

permissions.name: Read Inbox Messages
permissions.description: Request permission to read chat messages.

params.name: conversationId
params.doc: ID of the conversation that contains the intended messages.

params.name: visibility
params.doc:
__Required.__
Filters for messages with the specified visibility setting.

- `BUSINESS_AND_PARTICIPANT`: Return messages visible to the business and the participant.
- `BUSINESS`: Return all messages.

params.name: paging.cursor
params.doc:
Pointer to the next or previous page in the list of results.

You can get the relevant cursor token
from the `pagingMetadata` object in the previous call's response.
Not relevant for the first request.

params.name: sorting.fieldName
params.doc: Name of the field to sort by.

docs.summary:
Retrieves messages between the business and participant.

Up to 30 messages are returned per request.
If the number of messages is larger than the returned page,
`pagingMetadata.cursors` is returned in the response,
indicating that another page of results is available.
To retrieve the next page,
pass the `next` cursor value
in the next request's `paging.cursor` parameter.

> **Important:**
> To ensure you'll always retrieve the next record,
> use the same visibility and sorting
> in the first request and all subsequent requests.

By default,
30 messages are retrieved,
sorted by `sequence` in descending order
(the most recent messages are first in the list).

permissions.name: Manage Inbox Messages
permissions.description: Request permissions to read and send chat messages on behalf of the site and visitors.

params.name: conversationId
params.doc: ID of the conversation to add the message to.

params.name: sendNotifications
params.doc:
Controls whether the message triggers notifications when it's received.

 Defaults to `false`.

params.name: silent
params.doc:
Controls whether the unread count and conversation summary
 are updated in the
 [Message List](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-inbox-getting-started#view-your-messages).

 If `true`, unread count and conversation summary are not updated.

 Defaults to `false`.

params.name: sendAs
params.doc:
Controls which identity to use in the message's `sender` property.

- `CALLER`: Uses the identity included in the request header.
- `PARTICIPANT`: Uses the `anonymousVisitorId`, `contactId`, or `memberId` of the conversation's participant.
- `BUSINESS_USER`: For internal use. Uses the `wixUserId` of the person sending messages on behalf of the business.

Defaults to `CALLER`.
For 3rd-party apps, the app is the caller.

docs.summary:
Sends a message to the business or participant.

Specify the message type in `message.content`
by including the appropriate object: `basic`, `template`, `minimal`, or `form`.
For more information on message types
and how each type renders in Inbox and the Chat widget,
see [Message Types](#message-types).

Triggered when the business
 sends a message to a visitor, contact, or member.

permissions.name: Manage Inbox Messages
permissions.description: Request permissions to read and send chat messages on behalf of the site and visitors.

permissions.name: Read Inbox Messages
permissions.description: Request permission to read chat messages.

docs.summary:
Triggered when a visitor, contact, or member
 sends a message to the business.

permissions.name: Manage Inbox Messages
permissions.description: Request permissions to read and send chat messages on behalf of the site and visitors.

permissions.name: Read Inbox Messages
permissions.description: Request permission to read chat messages.

docs.summary: Triggered when a postback button is clicked.

permissions.name: Manage Inbox Messages
permissions.description: Request permissions to read and send chat messages on behalf of the site and visitors.

permissions.name: Read Inbox Messages
permissions.description: Request permission to read chat messages.

Fully Qualified Domain Name.

members.name: eventTime
members.doc: Event timestamp.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether this event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application (e.g., GDPR).

members.name: originatedFrom
members.doc: If present, indicates the action that triggered the event.

members.name: body

members.name: items
members.doc:
List of plain text messages, images, and/or files.
 List items are displayed as separate messages
 in Inbox and the site's chat widget.

members.name: text
members.doc: Text message.

members.name: image
members.doc:
Image message.
 Can contain an image from Wix Media
 or from an external provider.

members.name: file
members.doc:
File attachment.
 Can contain a file from Wix Media or an external provider.
 TODO do we allow it for SMS

members.name: id
members.doc:
Wix Media ID.
TODO make mandatory when media endpoint is ready

members.name: url
members.doc: URL where the image is hosted.

members.name: filename
members.doc: File name of the original file.

members.name: width
members.doc: Original image width, in pixels.

members.name: height
members.doc: Original image height, in pixels.

members.name: id
members.doc:
Wix Media ID.
TODO make mandatory when media endpoint is ready

members.name: url
members.doc: URL where the file is hosted.

members.name: filename
members.doc: File name of the original file.

members.name: mimeType
members.doc: File [MIME type](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Basics_of_HTTP/MIME_types).

members.name: title
members.doc: Title displayed in the message.

members.name: buttons
members.doc:
List of buttons to display with the message.
 Buttons can either open a URL or pass interaction details to the
 [Button Interacted Webhook](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/all-apis/inbox/button-interacted-webhook).

 Maximum: 10 buttons.

members.name: orientation
members.doc:
Controls whether the message is displayed in portrait or landscape layout.

 Defaults to `PORTRAIT`.

members.name: textLines
members.doc:
List of lines of text. Each item in the array is displayed on a new line.

 Maximum: 10 lines, up to 512 characters per line.

members.name: imageUrl
members.doc: URL where the icon is hosted.

members.name: text
members.doc: Message text.

members.name: iconUrl
members.doc: URL where the icon is hosted.

members.name: url
members.doc: If included, URL the user is redirected to when clicking the message.

members.name: title
members.doc: Form title displayed in the message.

members.name: description
members.doc: Form description displayed below the title.

members.name: fields
members.doc: List of form fields and values.

members.name: media
members.doc:
List of files and/or images attached to the form.

 List items are displayed as separate messages
 in Inbox and the site's chat widget.

members.name: text
members.doc: Text message. `\n` renders as a line break.

members.name: buttons
members.doc:
List of buttons to display with the message.
 Buttons can either open a URL or pass interaction details to the
 [Button Interacted Webhook](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/all-apis/inbox/button-interacted-webhook).

 Maximum: 10 buttons.

members.name: imageUrl
members.doc: URL where the icon is hosted.

members.name: name
members.doc: Form field display name.

members.name: value
members.doc: Submitted value.

members.name: image
members.doc:
Image message.
 Can contain an image from Wix Media
 or from an external provider.

members.name: file
members.doc:
File attachment.
 Can contain a file from Wix Media or an external provider.

members.name: label
members.doc: Button label text.

members.name: launchUrl
members.doc: If included, the button launches the specified URL.

members.name: postbackProperties
members.doc:
Properties to pass to the
 [Button Interacted webhook](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/inbox/messages/button-interacted-webhook)
 when the button is clicked.

members.name: appId
members.doc: [Your app's](https://dev.wix.com/dc3/my-apps) App ID.

members.name: interactionId
members.doc: ID you define for the interaction, to be handled by your server.

members.name: contactId
members.doc:
Optional site
[contact](https://www.wix.com/my-account/site-selector/?buttonText=Select%20Site&title=Select%20a%20Site&autoSelectOnSingleSite=true&actionUrl=https:%2F%2Fwww.wix.com%2Fdashboard%2F%7B%7BmetaSiteId%7D%7D%2Fcontacts) ID.

members.name: anonymousVisitorId
members.doc: Anonymous site visitor ID.

members.name: memberId
members.doc:
Site
 [member](https://www.wix.com/my-account/site-selector/?buttonText=Select%20Site&title=Select%20a%20Site&autoSelectOnSingleSite=true&actionUrl=https:%2F%2Fwww.wix.com%2Fdashboard%2F%7B%7BmetaSiteId%7D%7D%2Fmember-permissions/members)
 ID.

members.name: wixUserId
members.doc: User ID of the site owner or a site contributor.

members.name: appId
members.doc: App ID.

members.name: id
members.doc: Message ID.

members.name: content
members.doc: Structured message content.

members.name: sender
members.doc:
ID of the message sender.

Defaults to the caller's ID
using the property that matches their identity type.
For 3rd-party apps, defaults to using the app's `appId`.

You can override the default behavior when calling
[Send Message](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/inbox/messages/send-message)
by using the `sendAs` parameter.

members.name: badges
members.doc:
Optional icon and short text
 that give an additional detail about the message,
 such as the app the message was sent from
 or whether the message was an automated response.

 Currently only 1 badge is supported.

members.name: targetChannels
members.doc:
Communication channel to send the message to.

 Currently messages can be sent to 1 channel only.

members.name: sourceChannel
members.doc: Communication channel the message is sent from.

members.name: appId
members.doc:
ID of the application that sent the message.

 Omitted if the message was sent with the Chat widget.

members.name: visibility
members.doc:
__Required.__
Controls who can see the message.

- `BUSINESS_AND_PARTICIPANT`: Visible to the participant and site contributors.
- `BUSINESS`: Visible to site contributors only.

members.name: sequence
members.doc:
Sequential ordering of the message.
 Ensures more accurate sorting than `createdDate`
 if two messages are sent at the same time.

members.name: direction
members.doc:
__Required.__
Message direction.

- `BUSINESS_TO_PARTICIPANT`: The message was sent from the business to the participant.
- `PARTICIPANT_TO_BUSINESS`: The message was sent from the participant to the business.

members.name: createdDate
members.doc: Date and time the message was sent.

members.name: previewText
members.doc:
Summary of message contents.
 Displayed in Inbox in the
 [Message List](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-inbox-getting-started#view-your-messages).

members.name: title
members.doc: Message title.

members.name: basic
members.doc: Plain text, file, or image message.

members.name: template
members.doc:
Template containing an image, title, text,
 and/or up to 10 call-to-action buttons.

members.name: minimal
members.doc:
Minimal message containing a single line of text
 and an optional icon.
 Often reports an activity that took place.

members.name: form
members.doc:
Message containing submitted form data.
 Typically sent with a `direction` of `PARTICIPANT_TO_BUSINESS`
 and message `visibility` of `BUSINESS`.

members.name: system
members.doc:
System message.
 For internal use.

members.name: text
members.doc: Display text.

members.name: iconUrl
members.doc: URL where the icon is hosted.

members.name: badgeVisibility
members.doc:
Controls whether the badge is visible to the participant.
 Currently not supported in the Chat widget.

members.name: conversationId
members.doc: Conversation ID.

members.name: message
members.doc: Sent message.

members.name: conversationId
members.doc: Conversation ID.

members.name: message
members.doc: Sent message.

members.name: interactionInfo
members.doc: Optional info about interaction with app done by the user

members.name: conversationId
members.doc: Conversation ID.

members.name: appId
members.doc: [Your app's](https://dev.wix.com/dc3/my-apps) app ID.

members.name: interactionId
members.doc:
ID you define for the interaction,
 to be handled by your server.

members.name: interactedBy
members.doc: ID of the participant who pressed the button.

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs. Data set by the sending application

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: appName
members.doc: Name of the app this message belong to

members.name: appData
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs. Data set by the sending application

docs.summary:
Source of interaction message, will be available when message originated by interaction with an application.
 like clicking a button.
Set of key-value pairs. Unordered map of dynamically typed values.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type object

members.name: fields
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs. Unordered map of dynamically typed values.

members.name: kind
members.doc: The kind of value.

members.name: nullValue
members.doc: Represents a null value.

members.name: numberValue
members.doc: Represents a double value.

members.name: stringValue
members.doc: Represents a string value.

members.name: boolValue
members.doc: Represents a boolean value.

members.name: structValue
members.doc: Represents a structured value.

members.name: listValue
members.doc: Represents a repeated `Value`.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Number of items to load.

members.name: cursor
members.doc:
Pointer to the next or previous page in the list of results.

You can get the relevant cursor token
from the `pagingMetadata` object in the previous call's response.
Not relevant for the first request.

members.name: count
members.doc: Number of items returned in the response.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Offset that was requested.

members.name: total
members.doc: Total number of items that match the query. Returned if offset paging is used and the `tooManyToCount` flag is not set.

members.name: tooManyToCount
members.doc: Flag that indicates the server failed to calculate the `total` field.

members.name: cursors
members.doc: Cursors to navigate through the result pages using `next` and `prev`. Returned if cursor paging is used.

members.name: next
members.doc: Cursor pointing to next page in the list of results.

members.name: prev
members.doc: Cursor pointing to previous page in the list of results.

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by.

members.name: order
members.doc: Sort order.

members.name: conversationId
members.doc: ID of the conversation that contains the intended messages.

members.name: visibility
members.doc:
__Required.__
Filters for messages with the specified visibility setting.

- `BUSINESS_AND_PARTICIPANT`: Return messages visible to the business and the participant.
- `BUSINESS`: Return all messages.

members.name: sorting
members.doc: only message_sequence is supported for field name

members.name: messages
members.doc: List of messages between the specified visitor and the site.

members.name: pagingMetadata
members.doc: Details on the paged set of results returned.

members.name: conversationId
members.doc: ID of the conversation to add the message to.

members.name: message
members.doc: Message to send.

members.name: sendNotifications
members.doc:
Controls whether the message triggers notifications when it's received.

 Defaults to `false`.

members.name: silent
members.doc:
Controls whether the unread count and conversation summary
 are updated in the
 [Message List](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-inbox-getting-started#view-your-messages).

 If `true`, unread count and conversation summary are not updated.

 Defaults to `false`.

members.name: sendAs
members.doc:
Controls which identity to use in the message's `sender` property.

- `CALLER`: Uses the identity included in the request header.
- `PARTICIPANT`: Uses the `anonymousVisitorId`, `contactId`, or `memberId` of the conversation's participant.
- `BUSINESS_USER`: For internal use. Uses the `wixUserId` of the person sending messages on behalf of the business.

Defaults to `CALLER`.
For 3rd-party apps, the app is the caller.

members.name: message
members.doc: Sent message.

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_ORIENTATION
  • PORTRAIT
  • LANDSCAPE

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_CHANNEL_TYPE
  • CHAT
  • EMAIL
  • SMS
  • FACEBOOK
  • INSTAGRAM
  • WHATSAPP

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_VISIBILITY
  • BUSINESS_AND_PARTICIPANT
  • BUSINESS

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_DIRECTION
  • BUSINESS_TO_PARTICIPANT
  • PARTICIPANT_TO_BUSINESS

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_BADGE_VISIBILITY
  • BUSINESS_AND_PARTICIPANT
  • BUSINESS

`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the `Value` type union. The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`. Possible values are:
  • NULL_VALUE - Null value.

Possible values are:
  • CALLER
  • PARTICIPANT
  • BUSINESS_USER
